Ibis.desc: Container of all the settings required by Protran to translate the IBIS protocol.

Behaviour.desc: Container of the settings about all the software's behaviours.

CheckCrc.desc: values admitted: {true, false} (case insensitive) Def. true

ProcessPriority.desc: Gets or sets the priority of the Protran process in case IBIS is used. Values admitted: {AboveNormal, BelowNormal, High, Idle, Normal, RealTime }. Default value is AboveNormal

Simulation.desc: Container of all the information about the IBIS simulation.

TimesToRepeat.desc: Values admitted: {0, max int} 0 means infite times. Def. 1

SerialPort.desc: Container of the settings about the channel with the IBIS master.

ComPort.desc: Serial port's name. Free text (case insensitive) Def. COM1

StopBits.desc: Values admitted: {None, One, Two, OnePointFive} Def. Two

Parity.desc: Values admitted: {Odd, Even, Mark, Space, None} (case insensitive) Def. Even

RetryCount.desc: Tells how many attempts Protran has to do to open the serial port, if it is currently busy. Values admitted: an interger between 0 and 255. 0 means that Protran will not retry. Default value: 0

SerialPortReopen.desc: Attempt to reopen serial port due to errors{FrameOnly, All, None}. Default value: FrameOnly

Recording.desc: Container of all the information about a registration on file of a channel.

Active.desc: Values admitted: {true, false} (case insensitive) Def. false

Format.desc: The file format for the recording. Values admitted: {Protran,Gismo}

TimeSync.desc: Container of the settings about the date-time synchronization process.

InitialDelay.desc: Time to wait before the time sync is started.

WaitTelegrams.desc: Number of telegrams to check before the time is considered valid.

Tolerance.desc: Tolerance above which the difference has to be for the time to be synchronized

FlushNumberOfStations.desc: Number of stations to collect before sending all of them to the media player. Values admitted: a positive integer value {1; 65535}. Default value: 5

FlushTimeout.desc: Amount of time to wait before forcing a send of all the current stations collected. Default value: 30

FirstStopIndexValue.desc: The value of the index of the first stop. Values admitted {0, 1}. Default value: 0

EndingStopValue.desc: The value of the stop that has to be considered as the end of a sequence of stops (and not really a proper stop as the others). Values admitted {99 or 999}. Default value: 99

HideLastStop.desc: Tells if the last stop should be shown or not. You might want to hide the last stop if you prefer not to show the destination name twice when aproaching the destination. Values admitted: {true, false}. Default is false.

HideDestinationBelow.desc: the threshold below which the destination has to be hidden. Set this value to one more than the number of stops visible in your Perlschnur to hide the destination information (see UsedForDestination, ...) if the last stop is visible in the Perlschnur.

DeleteRouteIndexValue.desc: The value of the index to delete a route. Values admitted {-1, 0}. Default value: -1

Transformations.desc: Container of all the transformation that Protran has to do on the IBIS telegrams.

RegexMapping.desc: Remove all the leading zeros from a string and remove the last character.
Remove all the leading zeros from a string, and also the last character.
